sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bù shì xuésheng, érshì lǎoshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il n'est pas étudiant, mais enseignant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is not a student, but a teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le juge a annoncé le verdict.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The judge announced the verdict.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons tous respecter la loi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must all obey the law.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请给我一个准确的答案。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī gè zhǔnquè de dá'àn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner une réponse précise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me an accurate answer.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette boîte est carrée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This box is square.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这部电影反映了社会问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù diànyǐng fǎnyìng le shèhuì wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce film reflète les problèmes de société.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This movie reflects social problems.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce type de nourriture est facile à digérer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This type of food is easy to digest.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī zhìdìng le xīn de fāngzhēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a établi de nouvelles directives.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company has established new guidelines.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le week-end, j'aime me détendre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: On weekends, I like to relax.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez fermer la porte en passant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please close the door behind you.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le climat ici est très doux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The climate here is very mild.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要一个新的方案。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào yī gè xīn de fāng'àn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons besoin d'un nouveau plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need a new plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你要努力学习，否则会不及格。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào nǔlì xuéxí, fǒuzé huì bù jígé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois étudier dur, sinon tu échoueras.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You must study hard, otherwise you will fail.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille au département des ventes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works in the sales department.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan tā de xiězuò fēnggé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime son style d'écriture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like his writing style.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde a exprimé son accord les uns après les autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone expressed their agreement one after another.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils ont rompu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They broke up.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils sont mari et femme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They are a married couple.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le paysage ici est très beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The scenery here is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Que signifie ce symbole ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What does this symbol mean?
